LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsDisableCorpses: Disable spawned pawn corpses and dropped items
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsSpawnOnThreats: Spawn pawns only when threats are detected
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaleSpawnTime: Scale spawn interval to pawn combat power (overrides fixed spawn interval)
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaleSpawnTimePoints: Scale spawn interval points per second: {0}
LanguageData.RimSpawners_PawnSelectionDesc: Select the type of pawn to spawn
LanguageData.RimSpawners_ResetDesc: Resets the spawner and its AI
LanguageData.RimSpawners_UniversalAssemblerInspectDor: Dormant until a threat is detected
